songInfo.songwriter: by Frank Beard / Billy Gibbons / Dusty Hill

lyrics.l: I done ran into my baby and finally found my old blue jean
I done ran into my baby and finally found my old blue jean

Well, I could tell that they was mine from the oil and the
gasoline
If I ever get back my blue jean, Lord, how happy could one man be
If I ever get back my blue jean, Lord, how happy could one man be
'Cause if I get back those blue jean you know, my baby be bringin'
